item.title: Week 1
item.description: Monday, January 6 Introduction to the course; curation and collecting; how the web works

item.title: Week 2
item.description: Monday, January 13 Follow-up from previous class: static sites and introduction to curation Build and refine your own portfolio using hugo. Reading: https://guide.dhcuration.org/ Writing, aka the debrief (for this week, write it on your computer; we will use an online system for this starting next week)
